mail.subject: Real estate contract expired.
mail.content:
Real estate contract expired, the House was recovered.
An article was placed in the House, all of the goods <font color="#00a2ed">Movers storage warehouses</font>Moved to. Movers storage warehouses are located next to my portraits at the bottom of the screen, click on the button you can use to access it.
[Notice] Movers storage warehouses in item <font color="#00a2ed">Storage period of 90 days (the item is purchased by Megan Barrett and cache, 365 days)</font>. They're all disposal disposal of goods period, you will not be able to find more.

mail.subject: 12/19(SAT) on-time won the event.
mail.content:
How are you. MapleStory 2.
On time to participate in the event is limited to the first 5 people only hotter. Congratulate you win! ^^
As guided through a notice [On-time NEXON cache coupons]Pays.
Attached to this mail [On-time NEXON cache coupons]Is Belongings window (inventory) or safe (Golden Bank) Please keep well.
For those who have a coupon on the 12December 21 (Monday) at 7:00 pm after the sequential Nexon, the cache will be paid 5,000 yuan.
In the future, expect us MapleStory 2 Ask a lot of love and attention.
Thank you.

mail.subject: 12/19(SAT) on-time event was paid 300 Tome Bobcats.
mail.content:
How are you. MapleStory 2.
First of all thank you for your participation in the event the whole time.
Veterans who really unfortunately cannot lift in the first 5 million people. However, there is no need to be disappointed.
Because the notice was an appointment through Do so! This is because you paid 300 Tome Bobcats.
Below [Get all of the]Click on Attached to this mail please accept renal 300 Tome. After that please enjoy shopping in the market. ^^
There are several benefits to continue forward to miss the event, Not too hard to ask for a lot of love and attention.
Thank you.

Level up as a memorial to send you gift items~ Further, faster and it's going to help you grow strong.
Sent items is useful, Please grow up a storm as a great adventurer!
GOOD LUCK!
Thank you very much.

It shows even more that the strength of the elves in the forest are now becoming powerful enough to fend of the dark stuff ... If you want outstanding, such as doctors for life went ahead without a hitch thanks a lot cut off an aura take the dark stream, how ... Huh huh huh.
